listitem.para: WINHELP has two forms: with and without a keyword input. When no keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; opens the Windows help on filename to the table of contents. When a keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; searches the Windows help for the section on keyword within the given help file. You must enter the full keyword.
The WinHelp file format has been deprecated by Microsoft. Therefore, this command is deprecated in &PRODUCTNAME;.

programlisting.userinput: ; Open winhelp file for notepad.exe WINHELP "c:\\windows\\help\\notepad.hlp
